title: Getting Started with Next.js 15 - The Ultimate Guide
excerpt: Discover the latest features and improvements in Next.js 15, including the new App Router, Server Components, and enhanced performance optimizations.

body.raw:
# Getting Started with Next.js 15: The Ultimate Guide Next.js 15 brings exciting new features and improvements that make building React applications even more powerful and efficient. In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore what's new and how to get started. ## What's New in Next.js 15? Next.js 15 introduces several groundbreaking features: ### 1. Enhanced App Router The App Router continues to evolve with better performance and more intuitive APIs. Server Components are now more stable and provide better developer experience. ```typescript // app/page.tsx export default async function HomePage() { const data = await fetch('https://api.example.com/posts'); const posts = await data.json(); return (

Welcome to My Blog

{posts.map(post => (

{post.title}

{post.excerpt}

))}
); } ``` ### 2. Improved Performance Next.js 15 comes with significant performance improvements: - Faster build times - Optimized bundling - Better tree-shaking - Enhanced caching strategies ### 3. Better TypeScript Support The framework now provides even better TypeScript integration with improved type inference and better error messages. ## Getting Started To create a new Next.js 15 project: ```bash npx create-next-app@latest my-app cd my-app npm run dev ``` ## Best Practices When working with Next.js 15, consider these best practices: 1. **Use Server Components by default** - They provide better performance and SEO 2. **Implement proper caching strategies** - Leverage Next.js built-in caching mechanisms 3. **Optimize images** - Use the `next/image` component for automatic optimization 4. **Follow the App Router patterns** - Organize your code according to the new routing conventions ## Conclusion Next.js 15 represents a major step forward in React framework development. With its enhanced performance, better developer experience, and powerful new features, it's an excellent choice for modern web applications. Start building with Next.js 15 today and experience the future of React development!
